title: Imagine That Ride Home
lyrics:
Imagine That Ride home
He pulls up for the 3 with only 2 seconds left
The Tigers need this one for the win
Yo
That was everybody screaming shoot it
Yo

That was the coach

Saying don't be afraid to go

So that's when he shot his shot

And every heart in the whole spot stopped like

Do-do, duh duh duh

Do-do, duh duh duh

Do-do, duh duh duh, duh



Imagine That Ride home

Broken hearted

And all alone

Imagine That Ride home

Cuz baby that's how you make me feel

Imagine That Ride home



Shes the first one to the office she's the last one to leave

Shes tryna get promoted to VP

Yo

That was her assistant saying good luck

Yo

That was the boss saying OK here we go

And right before they gave away the job

Every heart in the whole spot stopped like

Do-do, duh duh duh

Do-do, duh duh duh

Do-do, duh duh duh, duh



Imagine That Ride home

Broken hearted

And all alone

Imagine That Ride home

Cuz baby that's how you make me feel



Imagine That Ride home

Broken hearted

And all alone

Imagine That Ride home

Cuz baby that's how you make me feel
